net.edudb.console.executor

Interface ConsoleExecutorChain

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClearExecutor, CloseDatabaseExecutor, CopyExecutor, CopyExecutor, CreateDatabaseExecutor, DropDatabaseExecutor, DropTableExecutor, ExitExecutor, ExitExecutor, HelpExecutor, InitializeExecutor, OpenDatabaseExecutor, SQLExecutor

    public interface ConsoleExecutorChain
    An interface, that implements the Chain of Responsibility design pattern, that is used to execute commands passed from the console.
    Author:
    Ahmed Abdul Badie

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(java.lang.String string)
      Executes the passed command.
      void setNextElementInChain(ConsoleExecutorChain chainElement)
      Connects an existing executor chain with the argument chain element.

    • Method Detail

      • setNextElementInChain

        void setNextElementInChain(ConsoleExecutorChain chainElement)
        Connects an existing executor chain with the argument chain element.
        Parameters:
        chainElement - The ConsoleExecutorChain to be set next in the chain.

      • execute

        void execute(java.lang.String string)
        Executes the passed command. Classes that implement the ConsoleExecutorChain interface handles the execution of the passed command according to their functionality.
        Parameters:
        string - The command to execute.
